share 官网 邮箱地址 新浪微博 https://t.me/THAWallet_en Theia Users can receive apprentice through the invitation system, and instruct apprentice according to the task, thus obtain the calculation force. In addition, the apprentice uses Theia Wallet to purchase quantitative financial products or Yubibao, masters can obtain a certain percentage of the Apprentice reward. Global Master and Apprentice Initiative: Yubibao is the digital currency value-added service and demand digital money management service product of Theia wallet. It is easy to operate, has low threshold, without handling fees, and are available with access, so that you can manage your digital assets with more flexibility. Yubibao: Theia Wallet provides users with a variety of quality management products, users can use Bitcoin, Ethernet and other digital currencies to buy money products and gain income. Quantitative Finance: Global Master and Apprentice Initiative Yubibao Quantitative Finance Recommend Applications replicated Account login Code Login Setting Login password Password Setting successfully Password Setting failure 한국어
Version：V %s My Wallet
A personal account refers to a central wallet, which is saved by Theia for your private key. In a central wallet, there is no loss of wallet that cannot be recovered, and can be verified to retrieve your wallet and allow you to experience more services. Decentralized Wallet The private key wallet is to go to the central wallet, in the central wallet, all user authentication content, such as trading passwords, private keys, mnemonics, etc. are stored in the user\'s mobile phone local, not stored in the centralized server. If the user mistakenly deletes the wallet, forgets to back up the private key or mnemonics, will not be able to retrieve the wallet. Advantages Only the user saves the private key Defect There\'s mining fee. The transaction rate is slow. Mnemonic words, separated by space Start input What is notation word I have carefully read and agree to the terms of service and privacy Wallet Name We are highly recommending you that prepare a backup with wallet asset, export [mnemonics] to a safe place, and then start with using a tinny fund as start up. How to back up your wallet In case your phone loses or forgets your password, mnemonics can be used for your wallet or money. Please click on the mnemonics in order to make sure your backup mnemonics are filled in correctly Confirm the notation words which helps you remember your wallet Now write down these words. Your have 12 recovery words, write them down on paper and keep it safely. Copy a collection address Transaction Fees Transfer confirmed Fast Slow Attention! Theia does not store user passwords, can not provide recovery or reset unctions, passwords must be backed up well by users. Passwords are used to encrypt the private key, and strength is also important. Disclaimer Please ensure that the wallet has been backed up safely Theia does not bear any loss of loss of wallet, stolen, forgotten password and other assets lost! 共发出红包<font color="#FF6400">%1$s</font>个 收到红包<font color="#FF6400">%1$s</font>个 数量 总额 领取列表 红包详情 常见问题帮助 问 答 Theia红包说明 微博 积分抽奖 您拥有积分<font color="#00F7FE">%s</font>点 全球首款跨链生态钱包 您已成功邀请 名用户 感谢您的付出! 红包邀请 保存本地 复制您的专属邀请链接 - 登录享豪礼 - 1. 新用户注册并登录可获得%1s积分奖励 2. 新用户可获得购买币加宝收益首次翻倍的奖励 邀请有礼说明 2.每邀请1位好友注册并登录后获得好友币加宝收益7%额外奖励。（有效期3个月） - 邀请好友界面 - - 被邀请人界面 - 1.每一位用户注册成功并登录可获得奖励%s积分 2.每一位用户成功注册并登录后可获得购买加宝收益每次翻倍奖励。
